name: Battleship Lonewolf
description: Lone Wolf is a game to become a captain of the space warship “Lone Wolf" where in a space battle opera. You will fall into the charm of a gun that emits a powerful firepower toward the enemies, and you will be attracted by the various charms of the space warship “Lone Wolf”.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Card with 512MB video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: NA
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: NA
